How to softmod your PS2

Soft-modding the PS2

FreeMCBoot (FMCB)

Free Memory Card Boot, a.k.a FreeMCBoot or FMCB is the solution for most PS2 models. Later 90000-series models require another solution, covered separately.

FMCB cards can run several programs. Some essential ones are

  • Open PS2 Loader (OPL)
  • uLaunchElf

Fortuna, FunTuna, OpenTuna

Todo

Playing backup ISOs

Via USB

Not recommended, as USB 1 is too slow for FMVs and games struggle to play.

Via HDD

A great option.

Via local network

Todo.

Via MC2SIO

An easy option.
